Quote.Author: Thomas Merton
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest human temptation is to settle for too little

Quote.Author: Thomas Merton
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to study the social and political history of modern nations, study hell

Quote.Author: Thomas Merton
Quote.QuoteValue: Be good, keep your feet dry, your eyes open, your heart at peace and your soul in the joy of Christ

Quote.Author: Thomas Merton
Quote.QuoteValue: The tighter you squeeze, the less you have

Quote.Author: Thomas Paine
Quote.QuoteValue: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection

Quote.Author: Thomas Paine
Quote.QuoteValue: Reputation is what men and women think of us; character is what God and angels know of us

Quote.Author: Thomas Paine
Quote.QuoteValue: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph

Quote.Author: Thomas Paine
Quote.QuoteValue: If there must be trouble, let it be in my day, that my child may have peace

Quote.Author: Thomas Paine
Quote.QuoteValue: The World is my country, all mankind are my brethren, and to do good is my religion

Quote.Author: Thomas Paine
Quote.QuoteValue: A long habit of not thinking a thing wrong gives it a superficial appearance of being right

Quote.Author: Thomas Paine
Quote.QuoteValue: It is error only, and not truth, that shrinks from inquiry

Quote.Author: Thomas Paine
Quote.QuoteValue: Belief in a cruel God makes a cruel man

Quote.Author: Thomas Paine
Quote.QuoteValue: Suspicion is the companion of mean souls, and the bane of all good society

Quote.Author: Thomas Paine
Quote.QuoteValue: That which we obtain too easily, we esteem too lightly

Quote.Author: Thomas Sowell
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance

Quote.Author: Thomas Sowell
Quote.QuoteValue: People who enjoy meetings should not be in charge of anything

Quote.Author: Thomas Sowell
Quote.QuoteValue: Too much of what is called 'education' is little more than an expensive isolation from reality

Quote.Author: Thomas Sowell
Quote.QuoteValue: The least productive people are usually the ones who are most in favor of holding meetings

Quote.Author: Thomas Sowell
Quote.QuoteValue: A moral monopoly is the antithesis of a marketplace of ideas

Quote.Author: Thomas Sowell
Quote.QuoteValue: Talkers are usually more articulate than doers, since talk is their specialty

Quote.Author: Thomas Sowell
Quote.QuoteValue: The welfare state is not really about the welfare of the masses. It is about the egos of the elites

Quote.Author: Thomas Sowell
Quote.QuoteValue: Immigration laws are the only laws that are discussed in terms of how to help people who break them

Quote.Author: Thomas Sowell
Quote.QuoteValue: Over the generations, black leaders have ranged from noble souls to shameless charlatans

Quote.Author: Thomas Sowell
Quote.QuoteValue: The most basic question is not what is best, but who shall decide what is best

Quote.Author: Tom Brady
Quote.QuoteValue: Football is unconditional love

Quote.Author: Tom Brady
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a person who defends myself very often. I kind of let my actions speak for me

Quote.Author: Tom Brady
Quote.QuoteValue: If I have something to say, I want it to be meaningful

Quote.Author: Tom Brady
Quote.QuoteValue: I could talk food all day. I love good food

Quote.Author: Tom Brady
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a pretty good winner. I'm a terrible loser. And I rub it in pretty good when I win

Quote.Author: Tom Brady
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm out on the football field, I have so much confidence in what I'm doing

Quote.Author: Tom Brady
Quote.QuoteValue: Fortunately for a quarterback, you can play for a long time because you don't get hit very often

Quote.Author: Tom Brady
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never going to be fast, and nobody will ever mistake me for being fast

Quote.Author: Tom Brady
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing surprises me anymore in the NFL

Quote.Author: Tom Brady
Quote.QuoteValue: In Boston, they love their sports celebrities. And it's great

Quote.Author: Tony Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible

Quote.Author: Tony Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped

Quote.Author: Tony Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment

Quote.Author: Tony Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: Stay committed to your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach

Quote.Author: Tony Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers

Quote.Author: Tony Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: Passion is the genesis of genius

Quote.Author: Tony Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: People are not lazy. They simply have impotent goals - that is, goals that do not inspire them

Quote.Author: Tony Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish

Quote.Author: Tony Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten

Quote.Author: Tony Robbins
Quote.QuoteValue: The path to success is to take massive, determined action

Quote.Author: Tupac Shakur
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real

Quote.Author: Tupac Shakur
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have no fear of death. My only fear is coming back reincarnated

Quote.Author: Tupac Shakur
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing that comes to a sleeping man is dreams

Quote.Author: Tupac Shakur
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a struggle for every young Black man. You know how it is, only God can judge us

Quote.Author: Tupac Shakur
Quote.QuoteValue: It seems like every time you come up something happens to bring you back down

Quote.Author: Tupac Shakur
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't change on me. Don't extort me unless you intend to do it forever

Quote.Author: Tupac Shakur
Quote.QuoteValue: Is it a crime, to fight, for what is mine?

Quote.Author: Tupac Shakur
Quote.QuoteValue: We all gonna die, we bleed from similar veins

Quote.Author: Tupac Shakur
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a reflection of the community

Quote.Author: Tupac Shakur
Quote.QuoteValue: In my mind I'm a blind man doin' time

Quote.Author: Tyler, The Creator
Quote.QuoteValue: Youth is something I never wanna take for granted. I just want to smile and live life

Quote.Author: Tyler, The Creator
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm cool. That's all that matters

Quote.Author: Tyler, The Creator
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a follower. I'm a leader. And anyone who speaks their mind is always criticised

Quote.Author: Tyler, The Creator
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like people around me sad. I like making people happy

Quote.Author: Tyler, The Creator
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like being put in a box. I just make music, you know?

Quote.Author: Tyler, The Creator
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not hip-hop. I'm Tyler

Quote.Author: Tyler, The Creator
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really listen to rap; I just like to rap

Quote.Author: Tyler, The Creator
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a pretty nice dude. I have fun, and people take it the wrong way

Quote.Author: Tyler, The Creator
Quote.QuoteValue: For the record, I don't worship the devil. I just hate religion

Quote.Author: Tyler, The Creator
Quote.QuoteValue: I never had a drink in my life. I don't smoke or anything

Quote.Author: Van Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no black-and-white situation. It's all part of life. Highs, lows, middles

Quote.Author: Van Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I just need somewhere to dump all my negativity

Quote.Author: Van Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to win you must be prepared to lose sometime. And leave one or two cards showing

Quote.Author: Van Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: What you see is what you get

Quote.Author: Van Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: The point of jazz is, you do something and then you go on

Quote.Author: Van Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: The future is keeping you out of the present time

Quote.Author: Van Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: If it's what you do and you can do it, then you do it

Quote.Author: Van Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think nostalgia has to be negative

Quote.Author: Van Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: You learn to read the audiences after a while, and there are all different kinds of gigs

Quote.Author: Van Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Singing is my profession - there is no plan B

Quote.Author: Victor Hugo
Quote.QuoteValue: To love another person is to see the face of God

Quote.Author: Victor Hugo
Quote.QuoteValue: Music expresses that which cannot be said and on which it is impossible to be silent

Quote.Author: Victor Hugo
Quote.QuoteValue: When a woman is talking to you, listen to what she says with her eyes

Quote.Author: Victor Hugo
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is the flower for which love is the honey

Quote.Author: Victor Hugo
Quote.QuoteValue: A mother's arms are made of tenderness and children sleep soundly in them

Quote.Author: Victor Hugo
Quote.QuoteValue: Laughter is the sun that drives winter from the human face

Quote.Author: Victor Hugo
Quote.QuoteValue: Forty is the old age of youth; fifty the youth of old age

Quote.Author: Victor Hugo
Quote.QuoteValue: Change your opinions, keep to your principles; change your leaves, keep intact your roots

Quote.Author: Victor Hugo
Quote.QuoteValue: Perseverance, secret of all triumphs

Quote.Author: Victor Hugo
Quote.QuoteValue: Concision in style, precision in thought, decision in life

Quote.Author: Victoria Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: Even in the tough times, He's still a good God

Quote.Author: Victoria Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: In fact, we have a choice of freedom of heart to follow God

Quote.Author: Victoria Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, you know, I just - I believe marriage should between a man and a woman

Quote.Author: Victoria Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: Children are our future, and God loves the children

Quote.Author: Victoria Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: You need to love your life; you have to appreciate yourself

Quote.Author: Victoria Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember, the choices we make today shape the people we become tomorrow

Quote.Author: Victoria Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: I bake a chocolate cake from scratch every week

Quote.Author: Victoria Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: I just think that is so important to keep a strong support system, to keep yourself encouraged

Quote.Author: Victoria Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: You hold the keys of change within you. You be the change you want to see

Quote.Author: Victoria Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: Life doesn't always give us what we are expecting

Quote.Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quote.QuoteValue: Challenging the meaning of life is the truest expression of the state of being human

Quote.Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quote.QuoteValue: When we are no longer able to change a situation - we are challenged to change ourselves

Quote.Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quote.QuoteValue: Live as if you were living a second time, and as though you had acted wrongly the first time

Quote.Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quote.QuoteValue: Ever more people today have the means to live, but no meaning to live for

Quote.Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quote.QuoteValue: Life can be pulled by goals just as surely as it can be pushed by drives

Quote.Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quote.QuoteValue: A human being is a deciding being

Quote.Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quote.QuoteValue: The last of human freedoms - the ability to chose one's attitude in a given set of circumstances

Quote.Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quote.QuoteValue: Since Auschwitz, we know what man is capable of. And since Hiroshima, we know what is at stake

Quote.Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear may come true that which one is afraid of

Quote.Author: Viktor E. Frankl
Quote.QuoteValue: Even a genius cannot completely resist his Zeitgeist, the spirit of his time

Quote.Author: Vin Diesel
Quote.QuoteValue: It's insecurity that is always chasing you and standing in the way of your dreams

Quote.Author: Vin Diesel
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't had that many weird encounters with fans, thank God

Quote.Author: Vin Diesel
Quote.QuoteValue: I always have issues with trust

Quote.Author: Vin Diesel
Quote.QuoteValue: We all deal with being unfairly judged

Quote.Author: Vin Diesel
Quote.QuoteValue: You break her heart, I'll break your neck

Quote.Author: Vin Diesel
Quote.QuoteValue: I am definitely a person of color

Quote.Author: Vin Diesel
Quote.QuoteValue: I love what I do

Quote.Author: Vin Diesel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the most ambitious person you ever met

Quote.Author: Vin Diesel
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way anyone knows which girl I'm with is if a one-night stand goes on 'Howard Stern.'

Quote.Author: Vin Diesel
Quote.QuoteValue: A person in my position has to restrain himself

Quote.Author: Vin Scully
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as you live keep smiling because it brightens everybody's day

Quote.Author: Vin Scully
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a military general, a business guru, not a philosopher or author. It's only me

Quote.Author: Vin Scully
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't let the winds blow your dreams away... or steal your faith in God

Quote.Author: Vin Scully
Quote.QuoteValue: Good is not good when better is expected

Quote.Author: Vin Scully
Quote.QuoteValue: Losing feels worse than winning feels good

Quote.Author: Vin Scully
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to sit back, light up, and hope I don't chew the cigarette to pieces

Quote.Author: Vin Scully
Quote.QuoteValue: Statistics are used much like a drunk uses a lamppost: for support, not illumination

Quote.Author: Vin Scully
Quote.QuoteValue: You can almost taste the pressure now

Quote.Author: Vin Scully
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess my thermometer for my baseball fever is still a goose bump

Quote.Author: Vin Scully
Quote.QuoteValue: The roar of the crowd has always been the sweetest music. It's intoxicating

Quote.Author: Vince Lombardi
Quote.QuoteValue: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence

Quote.Author: Vince Lombardi
Quote.QuoteValue: Winners never quit and quitters never win

Quote.Author: Vince Lombardi
Quote.QuoteValue: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have

Quote.Author: Vince Lombardi
Quote.QuoteValue: The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual

Quote.Author: Vince Lombardi
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest accomplishment is not in never falling, but in rising again after you fall

Quote.Author: Vince Lombardi
Quote.QuoteValue: Practice does not make perfect. Only perfect practice makes perfect

Quote.Author: Vince Lombardi
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning is habit. Unfortunately, so is losing

Quote.Author: Vince Lombardi
Quote.QuoteValue: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary

Quote.Author: Vince Lombardi
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning isn't everything, it's the only thing

Quote.Author: Vince Lombardi
Quote.QuoteValue: We didn't lose the game; we just ran out of time

Quote.Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote.QuoteValue: I often think that the night is more alive and more richly colored than the day

Quote.Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote.QuoteValue: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together

Quote.Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote.QuoteValue: For my part I know nothing with any certainty, but the sight of the stars makes me dream

Quote.Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote.QuoteValue: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream

Quote.Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote.QuoteValue: I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process

Quote.Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no blue without yellow and without orange

Quote.Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote.QuoteValue: Conscience is a man's compass

Quote.Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel that there is nothing more truly artistic than to love people

Quote.Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote.QuoteValue: The way to know life is to love many things

Quote.Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish they would only take me as I am

Quote.Author: Virgil
Quote.QuoteValue: Fortune favours the bold

Quote.Author: Virgil
Quote.QuoteValue: They can conquer who believe they can

Quote.Author: Virgil
Quote.QuoteValue: Every calamity is to be overcome by endurance

Quote.Author: Virgil
Quote.QuoteValue: As the twig is bent the tree inclines

Quote.Author: Virgil
Quote.QuoteValue: But meanwhile time flies; it flies never to be regained

Quote.Author: Virgil
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust not too much to appearances

Quote.Author: Virgil
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not yield to misfortunes, but advance more boldly to meet them, as your fortune permits you

Quote.Author: Virgil
Quote.QuoteValue: Go forth a conqueror and win great victories

Quote.Author: Virgil
Quote.QuoteValue: Time is flying never to return

Quote.Author: Virgil
Quote.QuoteValue: Time flies never to be recalled

Quote.Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote.QuoteValue: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well

Quote.Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people go to priests; others to poetry; I to my friends

Quote.Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote.QuoteValue: Language is wine upon the lips

Quote.Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote.QuoteValue: Arrange whatever pieces come your way

Quote.Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote.QuoteValue: Rigid, the skeleton of habit alone upholds the human frame

Quote.Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote.QuoteValue: On the outskirts of every agony sits some observant fellow who points

Quote.Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote.QuoteValue: Yet it is in our idleness, in our dreams, that the submerged truth sometimes comes to the top

Quote.Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote.QuoteValue: To enjoy freedom we have to control ourselves

Quote.Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote.QuoteValue: Humor is the first of the gifts to perish in a foreign tongue

Quote.Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote.QuoteValue: I read the book of Job last night, I don't think God comes out well in it

Quote.Author: Vladimir Lenin
Quote.QuoteValue: A lie told often enough becomes the truth

Quote.Author: Vladimir Lenin
Quote.QuoteValue: The goal of socialism is communism

Quote.Author: Vladimir Lenin
Quote.QuoteValue: One man with a gun can control 100 without one

Quote.Author: Vladimir Lenin
Quote.QuoteValue: The way to crush the bourgeoisie is to grind them between the millstones of taxation and inflation

Quote.Author: Vladimir Lenin
Quote.QuoteValue: Without revolutionary theory there can be no revolutionary movement

Quote.Author: Vladimir Lenin
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes - history needs a push

Quote.Author: Vladimir Lenin
Quote.QuoteValue: When there is state there can be no freedom, but when there is freedom there will be no state

Quote.Author: Vladimir Lenin
Quote.QuoteValue: Our program necessarily includes the propaganda of atheism

Quote.Author: Vladimir Lenin
Quote.QuoteValue: Under socialism all will govern in turn and will soon become accustomed to no one governing

Quote.Author: Vladimir Lenin
Quote.QuoteValue: Democracy is indispensable to socialism

Quote.Author: Vladimir Nabokov
Quote.QuoteValue: The breaking of a wave cannot explain the whole sea

Quote.Author: Vladimir Nabokov
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it is all a matter of love: the more you love a memory, the stronger and stranger it is

Quote.Author: Vladimir Nabokov
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a great sunrise. I do not see why death should not be an even greater one

Quote.Author: Vladimir Nabokov
Quote.QuoteValue: Caress the detail, the divine detail

Quote.Author: Vladimir Nabokov
Quote.QuoteValue: There are aphorisms that, like airplanes, stay up only while they are in motion

Quote.Author: Vladimir Nabokov
Quote.QuoteValue: Satire is a lesson, parody is a game

Quote.Author: Vladimir Nabokov
Quote.QuoteValue: Literature and butterflies are the two sweetest passions known to man

Quote.Author: Vladimir Nabokov
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing revives the past so completely as a smell that was once associated with it

Quote.Author: Vladimir Nabokov
Quote.QuoteValue: I think like a genius, I write like a distinguished author, and I speak like a child

Quote.Author: Vladimir Nabokov
Quote.QuoteValue: A work of art has no importance whatever to society. It is only important to the individual

Quote.Author: Vladimir Putin
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes it is necessary to be lonely in order to prove that you are right

Quote.Author: Vladimir Putin
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who fight corruption should be clean themselves

Quote.Author: Vladimir Putin
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything will probably never be OK. But we have to try for it

Quote.Author: Vladimir Putin
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't read books by people who have betrayed the Motherland

Quote.Author: Vladimir Putin
Quote.QuoteValue: Thieves must sit in prison

Quote.Author: Vladimir Putin
Quote.QuoteValue: To pay more is the easy way. In fact, the solution possibilities to the problem are many

Quote.Author: Vladimir Putin
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the American people should express their preferences, and we'll accept their choice

Quote.Author: Vladimir Putin
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, life in Chechnya so far looks more like a life after a natural disaster

Quote.Author: Vladimir Putin
Quote.QuoteValue: Chechnya is part and parcel of the Russian Federation

Quote.Author: Vladimir Putin
Quote.QuoteValue: Cromwell is just as much of a bloody dictator as was Stalin

Quote.Author: Voltaire
Quote.QuoteValue: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well

Quote.Author: Voltaire
Quote.QuoteValue: It is difficult to free fools from the chains they revere

Quote.Author: Voltaire
Quote.QuoteValue: Appreciation is a wonderful thing: It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well

Quote.Author: Voltaire
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of medicine consists in amusing the patient while nature cures the disease

Quote.Author: Voltaire
Quote.QuoteValue: Tears are the silent language of grief

Quote.Author: Voltaire
Quote.QuoteValue: Judge a man by his questions rather than his answers

Quote.Author: Voltaire
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who can make you believe absurdities can make you commit atrocities

Quote.Author: Voltaire
Quote.QuoteValue: Optimism is the madness of insisting that all is well when we are miserable

Quote.Author: Voltaire
Quote.QuoteValue: One great use of words is to hide our thoughts

Quote.Author: Voltaire
Quote.QuoteValue: When it is a question of money, everybody is of the same religion

Quote.Author: W. C. Fields
Quote.QuoteValue: Start every day off with a smile and get it over with

Quote.Author: W. C. Fields
Quote.QuoteValue: A rich man is nothing but a poor man with money

Quote.Author: W. C. Fields
Quote.QuoteValue: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food

Quote.Author: W. C. Fields
Quote.QuoteValue: No doubt exists that all women are crazy; it's only a question of degree

Quote.Author: W. C. Fields
Quote.QuoteValue: I once spent a year in Philadelphia, I think it was on a Sunday

Quote.Author: W. C. Fields
Quote.QuoteValue: Set up another case bartender! The best thing for a case of nerves is a case of Scotch

Quote.Author: W. C. Fields
Quote.QuoteValue: Once, during Prohibition, I was forced to live for days on nothing but food and water

Quote.Author: W. C. Fields
Quote.QuoteValue: It ain't what they call you, it's what you answer to

Quote.Author: W. C. Fields
Quote.QuoteValue: Always carry a flagon of whiskey in case of snakebite and furthermore always carry a small snake

Quote.Author: W. C. Fields
Quote.QuoteValue: Never cry over spilt milk, because it may have been poisoned

Quote.Author: W. E. B. Du Bois
Quote.QuoteValue: Education must not simply teach work - it must teach Life

Quote.Author: W. E. B. Du Bois
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is the development of power and ideal

Quote.Author: W. E. B. Du Bois
Quote.QuoteValue: Education and work are the levers to uplift a people

Quote.Author: W. E. B. Du Bois
Quote.QuoteValue: The cost of liberty is less than the price of repression

Quote.Author: W. E. B. Du Bois
Quote.QuoteValue: To stimulate wildly weak and untrained minds is to play with mighty fires

Quote.Author: W. E. B. Du Bois
Quote.QuoteValue: A true and worthy ideal frees and uplifts a people; a false ideal imprisons and lowers

Quote.Author: W. E. B. Du Bois
Quote.QuoteValue: Every argument for Negro suffrage is an argument for women's suffrage

Quote.Author: W. E. B. Du Bois
Quote.QuoteValue: Make yourself do unpleasant things so as to gain the upper hand of your soul

Quote.Author: W. E. B. Du Bois
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe in life! Always human beings will live and progress to greater, broader, and fuller life

Quote.Author: W. E. B. Du Bois
Quote.QuoteValue: A classic is a book that doesn't have to be written again

Quote.Author: W. Edwards Deming
Quote.QuoteValue: A bad system will beat a good person every time

Quote.Author: W. Edwards Deming
Quote.QuoteValue: Quality is pride of workmanship

Quote.Author: W. Edwards Deming
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't describe what you are doing as a process, you don't know what you're doing

Quote.Author: W. Edwards Deming
Quote.QuoteValue: Innovation comes from the producer - not from the customer

Quote.Author: W. Edwards Deming
Quote.QuoteValue: We are here to make another world

Quote.Author: W. Edwards Deming
Quote.QuoteValue: Rational behavior requires theory. Reactive behavior requires only reflex action

Quote.Author: W. Edwards Deming
Quote.QuoteValue: All anyone asks for is a chance to work with pride

Quote.Author: W. Edwards Deming
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not necessary to change. Survival is not mandatory

Quote.Author: W. Edwards Deming
Quote.QuoteValue: Eliminate numerical quotas, including Management by Objectives

Quote.Author: W. Edwards Deming
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not enough to do your best; you must know what to do, and then do your best

Quote.Author: Walt Disney
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can dream it, you can do it

Quote.Author: Walt Disney
Quote.QuoteValue: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them

Quote.Author: Walt Disney
Quote.QuoteValue: Times and conditions change so rapidly that we must keep our aim constantly focused on the future

Quote.Author: Walt Disney
Quote.QuoteValue: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing

Quote.Author: Walt Disney
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique

Quote.Author: Walt Disney
Quote.QuoteValue: There is more treasure in books than in all the pirate's loot on Treasure Island

Quote.Author: Walt Disney
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're curious, you find lots of interesting things to do

Quote.Author: Walt Disney
Quote.QuoteValue: I only hope that we don't lose sight of one thing - that it was all started by a mouse

Quote.Author: Walt Disney
Quote.QuoteValue: When you believe in a thing, believe in it all the way, implicitly and unquestionable

Quote.Author: Walt Disney
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not like to repeat successes, I like to go on to other things

Quote.Author: Walt Whitman
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you

Quote.Author: Walt Whitman
Quote.QuoteValue: I am as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best

Quote.Author: Walt Whitman
Quote.QuoteValue: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough

Quote.Author: Walt Whitman
Quote.QuoteValue: Simplicity is the glory of expression

Quote.Author: Walt Whitman
Quote.QuoteValue: I no doubt deserved my enemies, but I don't believe I deserved my friends

Quote.Author: Walt Whitman
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, every hour of the day and night is an unspeakably perfect miracle
